title: Mobile Inquiry-Based Motivation-Enhanced English Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level English grammar and reading comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment focused on enhancing practical English proficiency applicable to workplace tasks for working adult learners

learning_goals: Learners maintain participation rates of over 80% by utilizing ARCS motivation design strategies in M-IBL environments
Learners complete an English inquiry project on work-related topics (e.g., accounting, report writing) within one week
Learners achieve motivation enhancement effects with an average score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in ARCS satisfaction surveys

resources: Mobile learning apps (Notion/Kahoot), Zoom, ARCS assessment tools, job-related English materials

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
